properties.Name: Bluewater Highway
properties.description: Follow the lane to the river.

properties.Name: Parr Line
properties.description: Watch for parking on road shoulder on both sides of the river.

properties.Name: Trail Park
properties.description: Follow the trail east towards the river

properties.Name: 2nd Line EHS
properties.description: Follow the path west to the river.  Please respect private property to the east.

properties.Name: Bruce Trail Parking
properties.description: Parking and trail is well marked.  The trail to the river is an old logging road.

properties.Name: Petro Canada Park
properties.description: Access off Bronte Road

properties.Name: Bronte Creek Provincial Park
properties.description: Fee parking

properties.Name: Bronte Creek Provincial Park
properties.description: Fee Parking

properties.Name: Erindale Park
properties.description: Main Parking Lot

properties.Name: Various Pools
properties.description: Fish south to the park

properties.Name: Various Pools
properties.description: Fish north to Burnhamthorpe

properties.Name: Wellington Road 124
properties.description: Follow the trail

properties.Name: Hwy 24
properties.description: Follow trail past information board to the river.

properties.Name: Quarry Drive
properties.description: Watch for access points off the railway tracks.

properties.Name: Forks of the Credit Provincial Park
properties.description: Main Entrance of the Provincial Park

properties.Name: Dominion Street Bridge
properties.description: Park here and fish the Forks or walk up Dominion Road to Forks of the Credit Provincial Park.  There is NO PARKING allowed on Dominion Road itself.

properties.Name: Ken Whillans Conservation Area
properties.description: Bass fishing is available in ponds.  Also walk to the river via the north side of the north pond for excellent fishing on the Credit River.

properties.Name: Caledon Railway Bridge
properties.description: The walk along the railway bed to the river is about 10 minutes.

properties.Name: Kennedy Road
properties.description: Railway trail parking

properties.Name: Ballantyne Dr
properties.description: A popular put in for drift trips to Cockshutt Bridge.

properties.Name: Parking
properties.description: Belwood Lake Conservation Area (fee to enter)

properties.Name: 2nd Line
properties.description: Watch for the staircase on the west side of 2nd line

properties.Name: Pilkington
properties.description: Moderately steep hill.

properties.Name: Wilson's Flats
properties.description: Excellent parking

properties.Name: Iron Bridge
properties.description: Note the bridge has been closed to vehicular traffic.  Parking is available on the east side.

properties.Name: Castlederg Side Rd
properties.description: Perhaps the most popular access point - for a reason.  Work the river on either side of the Side Road.

properties.Name: Finnerty Pools
properties.description: Fishing is available only in the Palgrave Conservation Area on the south side of the road.  This is pocket water and you can work your way back a few hundred yards.

properties.Name: Patterson Pools
properties.description: Work pools on either side of the bridge

properties.Name: Albion Hills - North Gate
properties.description: Make sure you do not block the lane for emergency vehicles that exit the park through the locked gate.

properties.Name: Finnerty Side Rd
properties.description: Note private property on the north side of the road - do not trespass.

properties.Name: Albion Hills
properties.description: This is paid parking (the fishing is worth the price...)

properties.Name: Bridge Pool
properties.description: Walk in from Old Church Road

properties.Name: Albion Hills Pools
properties.description: Work the water between the bridges

properties.Name: Palgrave Pools
properties.description: Work your way down from the fish ladder.

properties.Name: Londesboro Road
properties.description: Difficult launch point but decent pools.

properties.Name: Ball's Bridge
properties.description: A popular destination for locals.

properties.Name: Nile Road - Auburn
properties.description: Located on the west side of the bridge and accessible via Bridge Road, this is an excellent access point for launching boats.

properties.Name: Sharpes Creek Line
properties.description: An excellent launch point for boats.

properties.Name: Benmiller Line
properties.description: A popular take out spot

properties.Name: River Line
properties.description: The river is a 5 minute walk from the parking area at the end of River Line.

properties.Name: Canning
properties.description: This is a popular put in spot for boats.

properties.Name: London Street
properties.description: Free street parking is available.  The boat launch is at the end of London Street
